data.name: Sex with the Devil: VR Sex Scenes
data.detailed_description: This DLC contains some scenes from the main game, which can be viewed with VR technology.
data.about_the_game: This DLC contains some scenes from the main game, which can be viewed with VR technology.
data.short_description: This DLC contains some scenes from the main game, which can be viewed with VR technology.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (only 64-bit) or Windows 10 (only 64-bit)
  • Processor: 3.33 Ghz (4 Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
